item.title: Reply to jaymelynilao's tweet at https://twitter.com/jaymelynilao/statuses/1187353825914560512/:
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Reply to jaymelynilao's tweet at https://twitter.com/jaymelynilao/statuses/1187353825914560512/:

@jaymelynilao just generally a much bigger hassle compared to web. no option to do something simple without using a big framework and a million dependencies. dependency management is a pain. and the debug/build/deploy cycle is a lot slower #dev
